title: Food Bank Volunteer
description: Assist with sorting and distributing food to families in need.

title: Beach Cleanup
description: Join us to clean up the beach and protect marine life.

title: Community Health Awareness
description: Help organize health talks and distribute awareness materials.

title: Animal Shelter Support
description: Feed, bathe, and play with rescued animals.

title: Remote Fundraising Assistant
description: Help raise funds for school supplies and scholarships by reaching out to potential donors via email and social media. This is a fully remote role.

title: Online Mentorship Program
description: Provide career guidance and support to young people through virtual meetings and online resources.

title: Disaster Relief Donations
description: Support our disaster relief efforts by donating money for emergency supplies. No in-person service required.

title: Tree Planting Sponsorship
description: Sponsor a tree planting project to help combat climate change. We will send updates and photos of your sponsored trees.
